contents.text: Welcome to Scality, the world leader in AI-powered enterprise object and cloud storage.
For sales and enterprise solutions, press 1.
To discuss AI-driven cloud storage solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our enterprise AI solutions team.

navigationGoals: I need to discuss Scality's AI-powered cloud storage features with an enterprise solutions expert.
Discuss AI-driven cloud storage options for secure management of my private security firm’s surveillance data.
Discuss architecture options for integrating Scality’s AI-driven enterprise object storage into our infrastructure
I’d like someone to explain your AI-driven cloud storage features and how they work.
Discuss how Scality’s AI-driven cloud storage can manage large-scale physics research datasets

contents.text: To request pricing information or schedule a demo, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to sales for pricing and demo arrangements.

navigationGoals: I want to get pricing details and schedule a demo for Scality's offerings.
Request pricing details and schedule a demo for scalable object storage for my security consultancy.
Obtain detailed pricing and schedule a live demo of Scality’s cloud storage solution
I need to get pricing information and schedule a demo of your storage service.
Obtain pricing details and arrange a demo of the enterprise storage solution

contents.text: For technical support and developer tools, press 2.
For developer tools and API integration support, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our developer support specialists.

navigationGoals: I need assistance integrating Scality's APIs with our development environment.
Get help integrating your API into my field operations tracking application.
Troubleshoot API integration issues with Scality’s developer SDK
I need help setting up the developer API integration for my cloud storage.
Get assistance integrating the Scality API into my research workflow

contents.text: For service status and cloud operations inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve the latest service status information.

navigationGoals: I want to check the current service status and any ongoing operational issues.
Check the current status of my cloud storage services to confirm backups and uptime.
Check real-time service status and incident reports for our Scality cloud deployment
I want to check the current service status to make sure my storage is online.
Check the current operational status of my cloud storage services
